```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
climate_data <- read_csv("datasets/climate_monthly.csv")
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
data <- climate_data %>% 
  filter(Source == "GISTEMP") %>% 
  mutate(year = year(Date),
         month = month(Date))
```

```{r}
data %>%
filter(year >= 1995, year <= 2010) %>%
ggplot(aes(as.factor(year), Mean))+
  geom_boxplot(fill = "slategray1") + 
  labs(title = "Between 1995 and 2010 the global surface temperature increased
every year", subtitle = "Estimate of global surface temperature change between 1995 and 2010", x = NULL, y = "Mean of global surface temperature change in Â°C")
```
